comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: Captain of the SS City of New York, she had a long and eventful life. Possibly photographed for an inquiry about a collision with a German liner Pretoria in 1914, or for the famous incident when suction from Titanic's screws ripped her from her berth nearly causing them to collide in 1912. query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=F20814FC3F5E13... many fine photos oh her here, including several from the Titanic incident. www.maritimequest.com/liners/city_of_new_york_uss_harvard...
